item.title: It Needs A Genius To Understand The Simplicity
item.description: U changed the world; it is because of the people like you we C the world the way it is today. You didn’t make billions, but billionaires. You have such an impact not only on those who lived in your lifetime, but also on those who are yet to C the light of the day. Your influence is ubiquitous. The mankind will forever be grateful to you. R.I.P. Dennis Ritchie.
